tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensors (sensor_id INT,
  sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  acquisition_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (sensor_id));

CREATE TABLE acquisitions (acquisition_id INT,
  sensor_id INT,
  acquisition_date DATE,
  data_type VARCHAR(50),
  PRIMARY KEY (acquisition_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id));

CREATE TABLE locations (location_id INT,
  latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  location_name VARCHAR(100),
  PRIMARY KEY (location_id));

CREATE TABLE sensor_locations (sensor_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  installation_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (sensor_id, location_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id));

CREATE TABLE measurements (measurement_id INT,
  acquisition_id INT,
  value DOUBLE PRECISION,
  measurement_date TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (measurement_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (acquisition_id) REFERENCES acquisitions(acquisition_id));
